A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This review is for the die hard Star Wars fans. The movie was horrible!!!!!! They took scenes from THE RETURN OF THE JEDI & THE NEW HOPE. You would think Disney writers can come up with a somewhat decent story line. Instead they threw a bunch of crap together and called it a Star Wars movie. But for you new guys watching this saga\, you may enjoy it. Throw a bunch of light and special effect your happy.
